Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Another batch of materials scrapped?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Member A', 3: "Yes, sir. Even with the support from Akdilek, we're still unable to avoid this plight.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...This is just the way it is. They were devices deployed long ago, after all. See if you can recycle anything from the stash.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member A', 3: 'Roger.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Inside the Forsaken hideout, the well-organized Watanabe is giving out directives.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Member B', 3: 'The area around here has been getting more dangerous recently. Should we...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Have the scouts assess our surroundings again. We'll move our hideout if their report comes to the same conclusion.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member B', 3: "Understood. I'll join the scouting party as well, then.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't linger. Retreat if you have to, understood?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member B', 3: 'Of course, sir.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Forsaken might be an organization of a certain scale, but the lack of resources has kept them in a passive position for a very long time.'}
{3: 'Every move they make, Watanabe and the Forsakens are always walking on thin ice in order to keep all of their members safe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Alright, next.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hmm, next?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: 'Here, Mr. Watanabe!'}
{3: 'The multitasking Watanabe is so occupied that he has not noticed the significantly shorter company seeking consultation.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ugh, kids...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: "We ain't no kids! We're valuable members who just helped giving out food!"}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Sigh... Alright, alright.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So how can I help you? If you're asking for candies, I'm sorry, but those are needed elsewhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: "That's not why we're here!"}
{3: 'The group of kids protests by giving Watanabe the stink eye. That is when he realizes that the children have yet to attack him with their typical "fists of justice."'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Why are you all hiding your hands behind your backs? Don't tell me you've found more things to prank the others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: 'Ah—that is...'}
{3: 'The children try to hide the thing behind them, but Watanabe easily notices what it is, given how much taller he is.'}
{3: 'Covered in a thin layer of sand and misshapen from all the mishandling is a bouquet of flowers.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Flowers...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: "That's right. We were going to surprise you."}
{2: 'Child A', 3: "But now that we've been discovered—everyone!"}
{2: 'Child B', 3: 'Yep!'}
{2: 'Children', 3: 'Merry Christmas, Mr. Watanabe!'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Uh... But I don't think it's Christmas yet?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: 'That\'s what you say? Not "thank you"?'}
{2: 'Child B', 3: 'Say "thank you"!'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Alright, I got it, stop kicking me—thank you! I said it! Thank you!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yielding to their violent acts, Watanabe thanks them and takes the flowers.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'By the way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: "I guess you're wondering why we're giving you your Christmas present now."}
{2: 'Child A', 3: 'Because flowers wilt quickly in a place like this, we want to give it to you before it dies.'}
{2: 'Child B', 3: "It'll be too late if we wait 'til Christmas."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child A', 3: "Hmph, I'm glad we've come to an understanding. Just so you know, the flowers are edible, so remember to bring them to the guys in Logistics to make us some snacks!"}
{3: 'The children quickly disperse and go on their merry ways after Watanabe receives his gift.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Those kids...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Their "smarts" have gotten Watanabe chuckling. Putting down the flowers on his desk, he is about to see the next person when—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Member C', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe, a message from Babylonia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Show me what it says.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I see. I suppose that's worth responding. Do we have any devices that can connect to the satellite?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member C', 3: 'We do. But, sir, are you going to show up on their screen like this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Sure, what's wrong with it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member C', 3: "Everything! We can't have the Babylonians seeing the face and leader of the Forsaken covered in dirt. Where's our pride?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I know what you're saying... but I usually look like this as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member C', 3: "But this isn't a usual call, is it? Just grab a seat, and I'll find someone to put some makeup on you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But I'm a dude?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member C', 3: "So what? Makeup applies to people on the whole spectrum. Not that I'm going to put lipstick on you, so just listen to me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Sigh... Fine, just get it done quickly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member C', 3: 'Yes, sir! I got this!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After sending his very insistent companion away, Watanabe sneakily turns on the satellite connection.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm too old for makeup... Cough.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After connecting, Watanabe clears his throat before speaking to the screen.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So, this is Watanabe...', 4: '1'}
